title: Executive Order 6151-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, New Mexico
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 5261, dated January 20, 1930, which withdrew the public lands in Tps. 11 S., Rs. 14 and 15 E. of the New Mexico principal meridian, New Mexico, pending a resurvey, be, and the same is hereby, revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6151-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, New Mexico Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361975
